trs: Together with the bear, the wolf, the lark, the spotted eagle, the loon and the duck, reindeers were shamanic spirit[s], helper[s] of the shaman.

trs: A boy is born, he becomes a good hunter, to the cradle, the hand-pulled sledge whereto (?), a knife and silver to the sheath (?), one hung up front teeth of reindeers, for that he(?) becomes successful.

trs: The reindeer names: well, "bəjun" well these names, 'wild reindeer' there's also, "siru" 'male reindeer', "gəlun" 'untrained reindeer', "sačari" 'old female reindeer', "nʼami" 'female reindeer', "əŋnəkon" 'reindeer calf', "waŋgaj" 'infertile female reindeer', "gilgə" 'reindeer ox', "sujukan" 'reindeer bull up to one year', "nʼamukan" 'heifer up to one year', "awlakan" 'heifer older than one year'.

trs: Eh, reindeers, still, eh, there are different, "talaguk" 'reindeer that pulls the kettle[s]', "əmkəruk" 'reindeer that pulls the cradle', "tiksaruk" 'reindeer that pulls the tent coverings'.
